segments.text: What are you hiding in your coat pocket ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You want to take pictures of the inside of your pocket ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not even funny , Billy . This is my new snapshot sticker camera .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , there are adhesive strips on the backs . You can stick them anywhere .
segments.speaker: S2
